dashboard.description:
Summary metrics about containers running on Kubernetes nodes.

Use this Helm chart to launch Grafana into a Kubernetes cluster.  It will include this dashboard and many more dashboards to give you visibility into the Kubernetes Cluster.

This dashboard works on EKS and recent versions of prometheus with updated metrics definitions.

panels.description: 95th percentile request latency for Kubernetes API server component
panels.title: apiserver request latency

dashboard.title: Kubernetes eks Master Dashbaord
